newGHroupNote.value: In this section you can request access to a group. This is typically done to gain access to restricted software or to a specific group directory. HPRC staff will evaluate the request and if needed, contact the owner of the group. Please make sure you have a legitimate reason to request access

groupName.label: Provide group name you request access to
groupName.name: groupName

justification.label: Explain why you are requesting access to this group (e.g., project storage, shared software, collaboration, etc.)
justification.name: comments
justification.help: Explain the purpose of this group request. Include details such as: What the group will be used for (e.g., project data storage, shared software, collaboration). Why you should have access (e.g., relevant license, PI approval, related research work)
